about_the_game:
A sexy guide for a sexy game featuring a sexy heroine!

It contains a walkthrough with maps of the game and several hints and tips to complete it.

To make sure you've installed our DLC properly, go to your Steam client and click on:
Sexy Heroine! Part 2 > Properties > DLC

To use the DLC click on the following link and check the folder 2 Sexy Guide:
Sexy Heroine! Part 2 > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files

name: 2 Sexy Guide!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 or higher

  • Storage: 50 MB available space
